int dll_compar_int ( const void *  item1,
const void *  item2 
)

Simple comparator for signed integers

The implementation is trivial, it should give you a pretty good idea of how to write your own comparator functions for arbitrary data types.

Parameters:
item1 Pointer to first item
item2 Pointer to second item
Returns:
0 item1 == item2

1 item1 > item2

-1 item1 < item2
